explanation: The objects that may be involved in completing the task of putting washed lettuce on the table are Ladle (for washing), DishSponge (for washing), Plate (to place the lettuce on), SaltShaker, PepperShaker, Bowl (for washing), SoapBottle (for washing), Fork (for eating the lettuce), Ladle (for washing), Plate (to place the lettuce on), SaltShaker, Cup (for drinking), PepperShaker, Pan, butterknife (for cutting the lettuce), DishSponge (for washing), Spoon (for eating the lettuce), Knife (for cutting the lettuce).
